caption.p:
Percentage of the inhibition on LPS-induced NO, TNF- α and PGE 2 production in RAW264.7 macrophages of crude extracts of Z. rhetsa and prednisolone at 100 μg/ml and 50 μg/ml ( n = 3). † and ¶: the %inhibition on LPS-induced NO and PGE 2 production, respectively, which were not different significantly from prednisolone.
∗∗
p value < 0.01,
∗∗∗
p value < 0.001 compared with prednisolone.
